701923f-a.title: Bronx: Union Avenue - Southern Boulevard
701923f-a.text:
Union Avenue, north from near Southern Boulevard. The second
tall building on the west side of the avenue (left) is Public School
No. 25, at E. 149th Street.
August 16, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
701923f-a.folder: Union Avenue & Southern Boulevard, Bronx, NY
